title: Hi guys, please take some time to help me by filling this out!
selftext:
Hi, I'm from India and am doing my MBBS. I am conducting this study to understand the Public Perception of Information Regarding Mental Health Issues on Social Media in India. 

NO PERSONAL IDENTIFYING INFORMATION WILL BE ASKED/TAKEN 


You're eligible for this study if:

1. You're above 18 years old
2. You use social media.

This questionnaire will take you approximately 10-15 minutes to complete.

Thank you for taking the time to fill [Google Form](https://forms.gle/YgZMYNapxtpgkxbn6)this questionnaire!

I would be really grateful if you guys could take some time to fill this for me, as this paper would really help my career. Thank you!
